title: Love Island's Kendall Rae Knight goes public with new boyfriend Andrew Hughes
text:
Former Love Island star Kendall Rae Knight has gone public with her new boyfriend after finally finding the man of her dreams – in Preston.

The brunette failed to find lasting love during a short-lived stay in the show’s Majorcan villa, during which she embarked on a doomed romance with fitness fanatic Adam Collard.

But more than a year after leaving the show, Kendall, 27, admits she has been wooed by professional footballer Andrew Hughes, a defender with Championship club Preston North End.

So happy: Former Love Island star Kendall Rae Knight has gone public with her new boyfriend, Preston North End footballer Andrew Hughes

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, the TV personality shared her first snap with the Welsh sportsman, 27 - and revealed they had been dating for some time before finally going public.

Captioning the shot, she wrote: 'He got me. We’ve had the longest run at keeping us private but here I am ruining it!

'Thanks for making me the happiest I’ve ever felt and also irritating me for what feels like forever.. don’t worry I plan on being just as annoying for the foreseeable future.'

Backlash: Kendall's new relationship comes following social media backlash for having a nose job after she revealed she struggled to breathe ahead of the procedure

Kendall made her reality show debut on the 2018 series of Love Island, but became the first housemate dumped from the island following her romance with Collard.

During the Love Island Christmas reunion, the former shoe shop worker shared a kiss with fellow contestant Eyal Booker, but the romance soon fizzled out.

Her new relationship comes following social media backlash for having a nose job after she revealed she struggled to breathe ahead of the procedure.

Taking to Instagram in December last year, the brunette beauty insisted her decision wasn't made 'lightly or quickly', while stressing that she doesn't want to 'glamourise cosmetic surgery'.

Showcasing her new nose in a make-up free selfie, the TV personality started her post: 'Your damned if you do, your damned if you don't... so do what makes you content in life because at the end of the day, your inner happiness is all that matters. (sic)'

The beauty, who had her procedure done at the Elite Cosmetic Surgery in Turkey, insisted she'd been planning the surgery since she was 16.

'So last week it came out that I had a bump removed from my nose a few months ago (not a couple of weeks ago). I've never denied this or done this in secret as all my close friends and family had known I was planning on doing this for years and they saw me through it all.

'I have had so many questions about it so thought I would answer these and put up a few stories about my little nose journey and why I wanted it doing.'
description: The brunette failed to find lasting love during a short-lived stay in the show's Majorcan villa, during which she embarked on a doomed romance with fitness fanatic Adam Collard.
